task.summary: Default task

changelist.name: Changes
changelist.comment: [WIP] transacciones anidadas, listas con head, tail y split optimo, factorización de acceso a los roots, manejo flexible de database y transacciones con bloques with

task.summary: Updated commercial_positioning.md

Implemented LINQ integration with index-aware optimizer ensuring compatibility and fast-path execution. Added tests validating indexed equality, IN, range, AND/OR merges, and explain diagnostics. Public LINQ API remains backward compatible with no Python set materialization for index buckets.

Removed full_plan parameter from all QueryPlan.optimize methods and calls. Updated signatures and calls across multiple files including common.py, queries.py, lists.py, hash_dictionaries.py, and linq.py. Adjusted examples and tests accordingly.

Implemented CountedSet as a multiset-style Atom preserving Set semantics with immutability and correct index updates. Exposed CountedSet in the public API via proto_db/common.py and added comprehensive tests covering duplicates, removals, counts, iteration, mixed types, immutability, and persistence. Existing modules and tests remain unaffected, and all tests pass.

RepeatedKeysDictionary was updated to use CountedSet instead of Set with correct index update logic. Code duplication issues causing syntax errors were fixed. Targeted tests for CountedSet and indexed fast paths pass, while pre-existing unrelated test failures remain.

The code and tests were updated to replace all occurrences of optimize(None) with optimize(). Unit tests were adjusted to match the new optimize() signature and successfully passed without errors. A full test suite run confirmed no regressions and no remaining optimize(None) calls.
Created a requirements.txt listing optional dependencies and tooling suggestions. Core has no mandatory dependencies, and tests pass without extras. No source code modifications were made.

The project was prepared for PyPI publication with complete metadata, packaging, optional extras support, and automated CI release workflows. A version export was added, MANIFEST.in refined, README updated for extras installation, and a GitHub Actions workflow created for tagged releases. Build, twine checks, and install tests were verified with no changes to core runtime behavior or test requirements.

Se corrigieron errores y warnings en la generación de la documentación con Sphinx. Se eliminaron referencias a clases inexistentes y se ajustaron los docstrings para cumplir con reStructuredText. La compilación final de la documentación se realiza sin advertencias ni errores.

Added canonical_hash helper and adopted in sets for stable hashing. Enhanced LINQ with optimize() calls, alias normalization, and operator token unification. Implemented explain() with optional warnings on linear fallback and added extensive tests.
clean up testing cache

All 259 tests passed after fixing failing tests and improving query handling. Enhanced warnings, explain() support, LINQ behavior, and hashing consistency were implemented. The project test suite ran cleanly with no errors remaining.
[IMP] future_vision.md

[IMP] sets.py: implementation of Sets and CountedSet with lazy save to avoid persisting a set if it is finally not part of the persisted graph at commit. It allows limitless creation of intermediate sets during transaction processing, persisting only referred objects

The Sets and CountedSet tests were re-run and fixed, resolving issues in CountedSet.remove_at and count calculations. DBObject immutability errors during save were addressed by allowing certain internal attributes to be set. The full test suite completed successfully with all 259 tests passing.

Created two new documentation guides explaining fundamental concepts and practical recipes. Updated key API docstrings with warnings and notes for clarity. Successfully built the documentation with the new content included and verified render.

Three new test modules were added to strengthen ProtoDB’s test suite. These include concurrency stress tests, Hypothesis-driven property tests for collections, and integration tests verifying persistence and index usage. All tests run successfully without modifying core code or documentation.

Implemented comprehensive packaging with pyproject.toml including metadata and dependencies. Added MANIFEST.in for auxiliary files and configured GitHub Actions workflow for automated PyPI publishing on release. Verified local build and install functionality, preparing the repository for trusted publishing.

El README.md se actualizó para reflejar el estado actual del proyecto. Se eliminaron referencias obsoletas y se añadieron descripciones precisas de funcionalidades, instalación, ejemplos y documentación. El archivo quedó alineado con el código y la documentación vigente.

Updated README.md to accurately describe LINQ-like features, ANN functions, and parallel work stealing. Added new example sections and corrected outdated disclaimers. Documentation and examples were also updated accordingly.

Added foundational interfaces for pluggable query planning in proto_db. Introduced QueryContext dataclass and QueryableIndex abstract interface with build_query_plan method. Enhanced QueryPlan with get_cardinality_estimate and get_cost_estimate concrete methods providing default estimates; unit tests for WherePlan passed.

RepeatedKeysDictionary was refactored to implement QueryableIndex and generate query plans based on term operators. IndexedSearchPlan and IndexedRangeSearchPlan now include get_cardinality_estimate and get_cost_estimate methods with defined heuristics. Targeted tests for WherePlan passed, confirming no regressions due to these changes.

QueryPlan.execute now returns DBCollections for efficient pagination. Subclasses updated accordingly and tests fixed to use the new API. WherePlan.execute was adjusted to correctly filter results, restoring test passing.

Rewrote WherePlan.optimize to delegate query planning to QueryableIndex implementations. Managed index-backed and residual filters, returning optimized AndMerge or OrMerge plans where applicable. Verified AndMerge.execute correctly applies residual filters; tests pass successfully.

Integrated vector similarity search into the optimizer by generalizing index creation and updating add_index methods. Created VectorSearchPlan to execute vector searches and adapted vector indexes for query planning. Unit tests passed, confirming correct integration without breaking existing behavior.
README.md was updated to mark the project version as 0.1 alpha with a status badge and note. A pointer to the CHANGELOG.md was added. No code changes were made, only README modifications.

La documentación de Sphinx se actualizó para incluir nuevas funcionalidades de búsqueda vectorial. Se añadieron explicaciones, ejemplos y referencias API en varios archivos reStructuredText. La compilación HTML se completó con éxito y se generaron los archivos en docs/build/html.

Implemented a detailed, recursive EXPLAIN system producing a JSON tree. Modified QueryPlan and various plan nodes for structured diagnostics with nested plans and estimated metrics. All related unit tests passed successfully, enabling complete and transparent query plan visualization.

The task implemented the `RecursivePlan` class for native hierarchical graph traversal in ProtoDB, added the `.traverse()` method to the `Queryable` API, and integrated it within query execution. Comprehensive tests covering traversal directions, depth limits, cycles, and chaining were created. Documentation was updated to explain the new feature and parameters.

La documentación de Sphinx fue actualizada con nuevas funcionalidades de consultas jerárquicas, incluyendo una sección de cookbook y referencias API actualizadas. Se integró la nueva página al índice principal y se generó el HTML con éxito. Los archivos HTML generados se encuentran en docs/build.

Implemented select_many feature with API, engine support via SelectManyPlan, tests, and documentation. Added collection_selector and optional result_selector handling with correlated subquery execution. Documented usage and performance aspects.
[WIP] tests
[WIP] tests

[WIP] Root locking was implemented and consolidated for Standalone and Cluster storage backends with passing cluster locking tests. Single-node cluster lock and provider context manager usage were enabled and verified. Unrelated test failures outside locking scope remain and documentation updates are pending.

[WIP] La documentación fue actualizada para incluir una nueva sección sobre locking de root con ejemplos y notas de troubleshooting. Se enlazó en el índice principal y se añadió una sección al README.md. La documentación HTML fue generada exitosamente con Sphinx.
[WIP] locking en get_literals
[WIP] tests
[WIP] tests
[FIX] test revised (except concurrency)
[WIP] tests concurrency
[WIP] tests concurrency
[FIX] tests concurrency
[WIP] atributos inexistente -> None
[WIP] atributos inexistente -> None

Migrated attribute access to dot-notation by updating documentation and confirming code alignment. No helper-based patterns found; no code changes needed. Added style guide to README and changelog note.

The Sphinx documentation was updated to fix heading underline mismatches and improve formatting. The HTML site was successfully built with warnings reduced from 69 to 24. README instructions remain accurate, and the output is located at docs/build/html.
[WIP] full tests
[WIP] full tests
[WIP] full tests
